55/* ACLs associated with zone */
56typedef enum {
57 allow_notify,
58 allow_query,
59 allow_query_on,
60 allow_transfer,
61 allow_update,
62 allow_update_forwarding
63} acl_type_t;
64
65#define RETERR(x) do { \
66 isc_result_t _r = (x); \
67 if (_r != ISC_R_SUCCESS) \
68 return (_r); \
69 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
70
71#define CHECK(x) do { \
72 result = (x); \
73 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) \
74 goto cleanup; \
75 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
76
77/*%
78 * Convenience function for configuring a single zone ACL.
79 */
80static isc_result_t
81configure_zone_acl(const cfg_obj_t *zconfig, const cfg_obj_t *vconfig,
82 const cfg_obj_t *config, acl_type_t acltype,
83 cfg_aclconfctx_t *actx, dns_zone_t *zone,
84 void (*setzacl)(dns_zone_t *, dns_acl_t *),
85 void (*clearzacl)(dns_zone_t *))
86{
87 isc_result_t result;
88 const cfg_obj_t *maps[5] = {NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL};
89 const cfg_obj_t *aclobj = NULL;
90 int i = 0;
91 dns_acl_t **aclp = NULL, *acl = NULL;
92 const char *aclname;
93 dns_view_t *view;
94
95 view = dns_zone_getview(zone);
96
97 switch (acltype) {
98 case allow_notify:
99 if (view != NULL)
100 aclp = &view->notifyacl;
101 aclname = "allow-notify";
102 break;
103 case allow_query:
104 if (view != NULL)
105 aclp = &view->queryacl;
106 aclname = "allow-query";
107 break;
108 case allow_query_on:
109 if (view != NULL)
110 aclp = &view->queryonacl;
111 aclname = "allow-query-on";
112 break;
113 case allow_transfer:
114 if (view != NULL)
115 aclp = &view->transferacl;
116 aclname = "allow-transfer";
117 break;
118 case allow_update:
119 if (view != NULL)
120 aclp = &view->updateacl;
121 aclname = "allow-update";
122 break;
123 case allow_update_forwarding:
124 if (view != NULL)
125 aclp = &view->upfwdacl;
126 aclname = "allow-update-forwarding";
127 break;
128 default:
129 INSIST(0);
130 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
131 }
132
133 /* First check to see if ACL is defined within the zone */
134 if (zconfig != NULL) {
135 maps[0] = cfg_tuple_get(zconfig, "options");
136 (void)named_config_get(maps, aclname, &aclobj);
137 if (aclobj != NULL) {
138 aclp = NULL;
139 goto parse_acl;
140 }
141 }
142
143 /* Failing that, see if there's a default ACL already in the view */
144 if (aclp != NULL && *aclp != NULL) {
145 (*setzacl)(zone, *aclp);
146 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
147 }
148
149 /* Check for default ACLs that haven't been parsed yet */
150 if (vconfig != NULL) {
151 const cfg_obj_t *options = cfg_tuple_get(vconfig, "options");
152 if (options != NULL)
153 maps[i++] = options;
154 }
155 if (config != NULL) {
156 const cfg_obj_t *options = NULL;
157 (void)cfg_map_get(config, "options", &options);
158 if (options != NULL)
159 maps[i++] = options;
160 }
161 maps[i++] = named_g_defaults;
162 maps[i] = NULL;
163
164 (void)named_config_get(maps, aclname, &aclobj);
165 if (aclobj == NULL) {
166 (*clearzacl)(zone);
167 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
168 }
169
170parse_acl:
171 result = cfg_acl_fromconfig(aclobj, config, named_g_lctx, actx,
172 dns_zone_getmctx(zone), 0, &acl);
173 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
174 return (result);
175 (*setzacl)(zone, acl);
176
177 /* Set the view default now */
178 if (aclp != NULL)
179 dns_acl_attach(acl, aclp);
180
181 dns_acl_detach(&acl);
182 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
183}
184
185/*%
186 * Parse the zone update-policy statement.
187 */
188static isc_result_t
189configure_zone_ssutable(const cfg_obj_t *zconfig, dns_zone_t *zone,
190 const char *zname)
191{
192 const cfg_obj_t *updatepolicy = NULL;
193 const cfg_listelt_t *element, *element2;
194 dns_ssutable_t *table = NULL;
195 isc_mem_t *mctx = dns_zone_getmctx(zone);
196 bool autoddns = false;
197 isc_result_t result;
198
199 (void)cfg_map_get(zconfig, "update-policy", &updatepolicy);
200
201 if (updatepolicy == NULL) {
202 dns_zone_setssutable(zone, NULL);
203 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
204 }
205
206 if (cfg_obj_isstring(updatepolicy) &&
207 strcmp("local", cfg_obj_asstring(updatepolicy)) == 0) {
208 autoddns = true;
209 updatepolicy = NULL;
210 }
211
212 result = dns_ssutable_create(mctx, &table);
213 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
214 return (result);
215
216 for (element = cfg_list_first(updatepolicy);
217 element != NULL;
218 element = cfg_list_next(element))
219 {
220 const cfg_obj_t *stmt = cfg_listelt_value(element);
221 const cfg_obj_t *mode = cfg_tuple_get(stmt, "mode");
222 const cfg_obj_t *identity = cfg_tuple_get(stmt, "identity");
223 const cfg_obj_t *matchtype = cfg_tuple_get(stmt, "matchtype");
224 const cfg_obj_t *dname = cfg_tuple_get(stmt, "name");
225 const cfg_obj_t *typelist = cfg_tuple_get(stmt, "types");
226 const char *str;
227 bool grant = false;
228 bool usezone = false;
229 dns_ssumatchtype_t mtype = dns_ssumatchtype_name;
230 dns_fixedname_t fname, fident;
231 isc_buffer_t b;
232 dns_rdatatype_t *types;
233 unsigned int i, n;
234
235 str = cfg_obj_asstring(mode);
236 if (strcasecmp(str, "grant") == 0) {
237 grant = true;
238 } else if (strcasecmp(str, "deny") == 0) {
239 grant = false;
240 } else {
241 INSIST(0);
242 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
243 }
244
245 str = cfg_obj_asstring(matchtype);
246 CHECK(dns_ssu_mtypefromstring(str, &mtype));
247 if (mtype == dns_ssumatchtype_subdomain) {
248 usezone = true;
249 }
250
251 dns_fixedname_init(&fident);
252 str = cfg_obj_asstring(identity);
253 isc_buffer_constinit(&b, str, strlen(str));
254 isc_buffer_add(&b, strlen(str));
255 result = dns_name_fromtext(dns_fixedname_name(&fident), &b,
256 dns_rootname, 0, NULL);
257 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
258 cfg_obj_log(identity, named_g_lctx, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
259 "'%s' is not a valid name", str);
260 goto cleanup;
261 }
262
263 dns_fixedname_init(&fname);
264 if (usezone) {
265 result = dns_name_copy(dns_zone_getorigin(zone),
266 dns_fixedname_name(&fname),
267 NULL);
268 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
269 cfg_obj_log(identity, named_g_lctx,
270 ISC_LOG_ERROR,
271 "error copying origin: %s",
272 isc_result_totext(result));
273 goto cleanup;
274 }
275 } else {
276 str = cfg_obj_asstring(dname);
277 isc_buffer_constinit(&b, str, strlen(str));
278 isc_buffer_add(&b, strlen(str));
279 result = dns_name_fromtext(dns_fixedname_name(&fname),
280 &b, dns_rootname, 0, NULL);
281 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
282 cfg_obj_log(identity, named_g_lctx,
283 ISC_LOG_ERROR,
284 "'%s' is not a valid name", str);
285 goto cleanup;
286 }
287 }
288
289 n = named_config_listcount(typelist);
290 if (n == 0)
291 types = NULL;
292 else {
293 types = isc_mem_get(mctx, n * sizeof(dns_rdatatype_t));
294 if (types == NULL) {
295 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
296 goto cleanup;
297 }
298 }
299
300 i = 0;
301 for (element2 = cfg_list_first(typelist);
302 element2 != NULL;
303 element2 = cfg_list_next(element2))
304 {
305 const cfg_obj_t *typeobj;
306 isc_textregion_t r;
307
308 INSIST(i < n);
309
310 typeobj = cfg_listelt_value(element2);
311 str = cfg_obj_asstring(typeobj);
312 DE_CONST(str, r.base);
313 r.length = strlen(str);
314
315 result = dns_rdatatype_fromtext(&types[i++], &r);
316 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
317 cfg_obj_log(identity, named_g_lctx,
318 ISC_LOG_ERROR,
319 "'%s' is not a valid type", str);
320 isc_mem_put(mctx, types,
321 n * sizeof(dns_rdatatype_t));
322 goto cleanup;
323 }
324 }
325 INSIST(i == n);
326
327 result = dns_ssutable_addrule(table, grant,
328 dns_fixedname_name(&fident),
329 mtype,
330 dns_fixedname_name(&fname),
331 n, types);
332 if (types != NULL)
333 isc_mem_put(mctx, types, n * sizeof(dns_rdatatype_t));
334 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
335 goto cleanup;
336 }
337 }
338
339 /*
340 * If "update-policy local;" and a session key exists,
341 * then use the default policy, which is equivalent to:
342 * update-policy { grant <session-keyname> zonesub any; };
343 */
344 if (autoddns) {
345 dns_rdatatype_t any = dns_rdatatype_any;
346
347 if (named_g_server->session_keyname == NULL) {
348 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
349 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
350 "failed to enable auto DDNS policy "
351 "for zone %s: session key not found",
352 zname);
353 result = ISC_R_NOTFOUND;
354 goto cleanup;
355 }
356
357 result = dns_ssutable_addrule(table, true,
358 named_g_server->session_keyname,
359 dns_ssumatchtype_local,
360 dns_zone_getorigin(zone),
361 1, &any);
362
363 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
364 goto cleanup;
365 }
366
367 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
368 dns_zone_setssutable(zone, table);
369
370 cleanup:
371 dns_ssutable_detach(&table);
372 return (result);
373}
374
375/*
376 * This is the TTL used for internally generated RRsets for static-stub zones.
377 * The value doesn't matter because the mapping is static, but needs to be
378 * defined for the sake of implementation.
379 */
380#define STATICSTUB_SERVER_TTL 86400
381
382/*%
383 * Configure an apex NS with glues for a static-stub zone.
384 * For example, for the zone named "example.com", the following RRs will be
385 * added to the zone DB:
386 * example.com. NS example.com.
387 * example.com. A 192.0.2.1
388 * example.com. AAAA 2001:db8::1
389 */
390static isc_result_t
391configure_staticstub_serveraddrs(const cfg_obj_t *zconfig, dns_zone_t *zone,
392 dns_rdatalist_t *rdatalist_ns,
393 dns_rdatalist_t *rdatalist_a,
394 dns_rdatalist_t *rdatalist_aaaa)
395{
396 const cfg_listelt_t *element;
397 isc_mem_t *mctx = dns_zone_getmctx(zone);
398 isc_region_t region, sregion;
399 dns_rdata_t *rdata;
400 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
401
402 for (element = cfg_list_first(zconfig);
403 element != NULL;
404 element = cfg_list_next(element))
405 {
406 const isc_sockaddr_t* sa;
407 isc_netaddr_t na;
408 const cfg_obj_t *address = cfg_listelt_value(element);
409 dns_rdatalist_t *rdatalist;
410
411 sa = cfg_obj_assockaddr(address);
412 if (isc_sockaddr_getport(sa) != 0) {
413 cfg_obj_log(zconfig, named_g_lctx, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
414 "port is not configurable for "
415 "static stub server-addresses");
416 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
417 }
418 isc_netaddr_fromsockaddr(&na, sa);
419 if (isc_netaddr_getzone(&na) != 0) {
420 cfg_obj_log(zconfig, named_g_lctx, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
421 "scoped address is not allowed "
422 "for static stub "
423 "server-addresses");
424 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
425 }
426
427 switch (na.family) {
428 case AF_INET:
429 region.length = sizeof(na.type.in);
430 rdatalist = rdatalist_a;
431 break;
432 default:
433 INSIST(na.family == AF_INET6);
434 region.length = sizeof(na.type.in6);
435 rdatalist = rdatalist_aaaa;
436 break;
437 }
438
439 rdata = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*rdata) + region.length);
440 if (rdata == NULL)
441 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
442 region.base = (unsigned char *)(rdata + 1);
443 memmove(region.base, &na.type, region.length);
444 dns_rdata_init(rdata);
445 dns_rdata_fromregion(rdata, dns_zone_getclass(zone),
446 rdatalist->type, &region);
447 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rdatalist->rdata, rdata, link);
448 }
449
450 /*
451 * If no address is specified (unlikely in this context, but possible),
452 * there's nothing to do anymore.
453 */
454 if (ISC_LIST_EMPTY(rdatalist_a->rdata) &&
455 ISC_LIST_EMPTY(rdatalist_aaaa->rdata)) {
456 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
457 }
458
459 /* Add to the list an apex NS with the ns name being the origin name */
460 dns_name_toregion(dns_zone_getorigin(zone), &sregion);
461 rdata = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*rdata) + sregion.length);
462 if (rdata == NULL) {
463 /*
464 * Already allocated data will be freed in the caller, so
465 * we can simply return here.
466 */
467 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
468 }
469 region.length = sregion.length;
470 region.base = (unsigned char *)(rdata + 1);
471 memmove(region.base, sregion.base, region.length);
472 dns_rdata_init(rdata);
473 dns_rdata_fromregion(rdata, dns_zone_getclass(zone),
474 dns_rdatatype_ns, &region);
475 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rdatalist_ns->rdata, rdata, link);
476
477 return (result);
478}
479
480/*%
481 * Configure an apex NS with an out-of-zone NS names for a static-stub zone.
482 * For example, for the zone named "example.com", something like the following
483 * RRs will be added to the zone DB:
484 * example.com. NS ns.example.net.
485 */
486static isc_result_t
487configure_staticstub_servernames(const cfg_obj_t *zconfig, dns_zone_t *zone,
488 dns_rdatalist_t *rdatalist, const char *zname)
489{
490 const cfg_listelt_t *element;
491 isc_mem_t *mctx = dns_zone_getmctx(zone);
492 dns_rdata_t *rdata;
493 isc_region_t sregion, region;
494 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
495
496 for (element = cfg_list_first(zconfig);
497 element != NULL;
498 element = cfg_list_next(element))
499 {
500 const cfg_obj_t *obj;
501 const char *str;
502 dns_fixedname_t fixed_name;
503 dns_name_t *nsname;
504 isc_buffer_t b;
505
506 obj = cfg_listelt_value(element);
507 str = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
508
509 nsname = dns_fixedname_initname(&fixed_name);
510
511 isc_buffer_constinit(&b, str, strlen(str));
512 isc_buffer_add(&b, strlen(str));
513 result = dns_name_fromtext(nsname, &b, dns_rootname, 0, NULL);
514 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
515 cfg_obj_log(zconfig, named_g_lctx, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
516 "server-name '%s' is not a valid "
517 "name", str);
518 return (result);
519 }
520 if (dns_name_issubdomain(nsname, dns_zone_getorigin(zone))) {
521 cfg_obj_log(zconfig, named_g_lctx, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
522 "server-name '%s' must not be a "
523 "subdomain of zone name '%s'",
524 str, zname);
525 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
526 }
527
528 dns_name_toregion(nsname, &sregion);
529 rdata = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*rdata) + sregion.length);
530 if (rdata == NULL)
531 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
532 region.length = sregion.length;
533 region.base = (unsigned char *)(rdata + 1);
534 memmove(region.base, sregion.base, region.length);
535 dns_rdata_init(rdata);
536 dns_rdata_fromregion(rdata, dns_zone_getclass(zone),
537 dns_rdatatype_ns, &region);
538 ISC_LIST_APPEND(rdatalist->rdata, rdata, link);
539 }
540
541 return (result);
542}
543
544/*%
545 * Configure static-stub zone.
546 */
547static isc_result_t
548configure_staticstub(const cfg_obj_t *zconfig, dns_zone_t *zone,
549 const char *zname, const char *dbtype)
550{
551 int i = 0;
552 const cfg_obj_t *obj;
553 isc_mem_t *mctx = dns_zone_getmctx(zone);
554 dns_db_t *db = NULL;
555 dns_dbversion_t *dbversion = NULL;
556 dns_dbnode_t *apexnode = NULL;
557 dns_name_t apexname;
558 isc_result_t result;
559 dns_rdataset_t rdataset;
560 dns_rdatalist_t rdatalist_ns, rdatalist_a, rdatalist_aaaa;
561 dns_rdatalist_t* rdatalists[] = {
562 &rdatalist_ns, &rdatalist_a, &rdatalist_aaaa, NULL
563 };
564 dns_rdata_t *rdata;
565 isc_region_t region;
566
567 /* Create the DB beforehand */
568 RETERR(dns_db_create(mctx, dbtype, dns_zone_getorigin(zone),
569 dns_dbtype_stub, dns_zone_getclass(zone),
570 0, NULL, &db));
571 dns_zone_setdb(zone, db);
572
573 dns_rdatalist_init(&rdatalist_ns);
574 rdatalist_ns.rdclass = dns_zone_getclass(zone);
575 rdatalist_ns.type = dns_rdatatype_ns;
576 rdatalist_ns.ttl = STATICSTUB_SERVER_TTL;
577
578 dns_rdatalist_init(&rdatalist_a);
579 rdatalist_a.rdclass = dns_zone_getclass(zone);
580 rdatalist_a.type = dns_rdatatype_a;
581 rdatalist_a.ttl = STATICSTUB_SERVER_TTL;
582
583 dns_rdatalist_init(&rdatalist_aaaa);
584 rdatalist_aaaa.rdclass = dns_zone_getclass(zone);
585 rdatalist_aaaa.type = dns_rdatatype_aaaa;
586 rdatalist_aaaa.ttl = STATICSTUB_SERVER_TTL;
587
588 /* Prepare zone RRs from the configuration */
589 obj = NULL;
590 result = cfg_map_get(zconfig, "server-addresses", &obj);
591 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
592 INSIST(obj != NULL);
593 result = configure_staticstub_serveraddrs(obj, zone,
594 &rdatalist_ns,
595 &rdatalist_a,
596 &rdatalist_aaaa);
597 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
598 goto cleanup;
599 }
600
601 obj = NULL;
602 result = cfg_map_get(zconfig, "server-names", &obj);
603 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
604 INSIST(obj != NULL);
605 result = configure_staticstub_servernames(obj, zone,
606 &rdatalist_ns,
607 zname);
608 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
609 goto cleanup;
610 }
611
612 /*
613 * Sanity check: there should be at least one NS RR at the zone apex
614 * to trigger delegation.
615 */
616 if (ISC_LIST_EMPTY(rdatalist_ns.rdata)) {
617 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
618 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
619 "No NS record is configured for a "
620 "static-stub zone '%s'", zname);
621 result = ISC_R_FAILURE;
622 goto cleanup;
623 }
624
625 /*
626 * Now add NS and glue A/AAAA RRsets to the zone DB.
627 * First open a new version for the add operation and get a pointer
628 * to the apex node (all RRs are of the apex name).
629 */
630 result = dns_db_newversion(db, &dbversion);
631 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
632 goto cleanup;
633 dns_name_init(&apexname, NULL);
634 dns_name_clone(dns_zone_getorigin(zone), &apexname);
635 result = dns_db_findnode(db, &apexname, false, &apexnode);
636 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
637 goto cleanup;
638
639 /* Add NS RRset */
640 dns_rdataset_init(&rdataset);
641 RUNTIME_CHECK(dns_rdatalist_tordataset(&rdatalist_ns, &rdataset)
642 == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
643 result = dns_db_addrdataset(db, apexnode, dbversion, 0, &rdataset,
644 0, NULL);
645 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&rdataset);
646 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
647 goto cleanup;
648
649 /* Add glue A RRset, if any */
650 if (!ISC_LIST_EMPTY(rdatalist_a.rdata)) {
651 RUNTIME_CHECK(dns_rdatalist_tordataset(&rdatalist_a, &rdataset)
652 == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
653 result = dns_db_addrdataset(db, apexnode, dbversion, 0,
654 &rdataset, 0, NULL);
655 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&rdataset);
656 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
657 goto cleanup;
658 }
659
660 /* Add glue AAAA RRset, if any */
661 if (!ISC_LIST_EMPTY(rdatalist_aaaa.rdata)) {
662 RUNTIME_CHECK(dns_rdatalist_tordataset(&rdatalist_aaaa,
663 &rdataset)
664 == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
665 result = dns_db_addrdataset(db, apexnode, dbversion, 0,
666 &rdataset, 0, NULL);
667 dns_rdataset_disassociate(&rdataset);
668 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
669 goto cleanup;
670 }
671
672 result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
673
674 cleanup:
675 if (apexnode != NULL)
676 dns_db_detachnode(db, &apexnode);
677 if (dbversion != NULL)
678 dns_db_closeversion(db, &dbversion, true);
679 if (db != NULL)
680 dns_db_detach(&db);
681 for (i = 0; rdatalists[i] != NULL; i++) {
682 while ((rdata = ISC_LIST_HEAD(rdatalists[i]->rdata)) != NULL) {
683 ISC_LIST_UNLINK(rdatalists[i]->rdata, rdata, link);
684 dns_rdata_toregion(rdata, &region);
685 isc_mem_put(mctx, rdata,
686 sizeof(*rdata) + region.length);
687 }
688 }
689
690 INSIST(dbversion == NULL);
691
692 return (result);
693}
694
695/*%
696 * Convert a config file zone type into a server zone type.
697 */
698static inline dns_zonetype_t
699zonetype_fromconfig(const cfg_obj_t *map) {
700 const cfg_obj_t *obj = NULL;
701 isc_result_t result;
702
703 result = cfg_map_get(map, "type", &obj);
704 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
705 return (named_config_getzonetype(obj));
706}
707
708/*%
709 * Helper function for strtoargv(). Pardon the gratuitous recursion.
710 */
711static isc_result_t
712strtoargvsub(isc_mem_t *mctx, char *s, unsigned int *argcp,
713 char ***argvp, unsigned int n)
714{
715 isc_result_t result;
716
717 /* Discard leading whitespace. */
718 while (*s == ' ' || *s == '\t')
719 s++;
720
721 if (*s == '\0') {
722 /* We have reached the end of the string. */
723 *argcp = n;
724 *argvp = isc_mem_get(mctx, n * sizeof(char *));
725 if (*argvp == NULL)
726 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
727 } else {
728 char *p = s;
729 while (*p != ' ' && *p != '\t' && *p != '\0')
730 p++;
731 if (*p != '\0')
732 *p++ = '\0';
733
734 result = strtoargvsub(mctx, p, argcp, argvp, n + 1);
735 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
736 return (result);
737 (*argvp)[n] = s;
738 }
739 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
740}
741
742/*%
743 * Tokenize the string "s" into whitespace-separated words,
744 * return the number of words in '*argcp' and an array
745 * of pointers to the words in '*argvp'. The caller
746 * must free the array using isc_mem_put(). The string
747 * is modified in-place.
748 */
749static isc_result_t
750strtoargv(isc_mem_t *mctx, char *s, unsigned int *argcp, char ***argvp) {
751 return (strtoargvsub(mctx, s, argcp, argvp, 0));
752}
753
754static void
755checknames(dns_zonetype_t ztype, const cfg_obj_t **maps,
756 const cfg_obj_t **objp)
757{
758 const char *zone = NULL;
759 isc_result_t result;
760
761 switch (ztype) {
762 case dns_zone_slave:
763 case dns_zone_mirror:
764 zone = "slave";
765 break;
766 case dns_zone_master:
767 zone = "master";
768 break;
769 default:
770 INSIST(0);
771 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
772 }
773 result = named_checknames_get(maps, zone, objp);
774 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && objp != NULL && *objp != NULL);
775}
776
777/*
778 * Callback to see if a non-recursive query coming from 'srcaddr' to
779 * 'destaddr', with optional key 'mykey' for class 'rdclass' would be
780 * delivered to 'myview'.
781 *
782 * We run this unlocked as both the view list and the interface list
783 * are updated when the appropriate task has exclusivity.
784 */
785static bool
786isself(dns_view_t *myview, dns_tsigkey_t *mykey,
787 const isc_sockaddr_t *srcaddr, const isc_sockaddr_t *dstaddr,
788 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass, void *arg)
789{
790 ns_interfacemgr_t *interfacemgr = (ns_interfacemgr_t *) arg;
791 dns_aclenv_t *env = ns_interfacemgr_getaclenv(interfacemgr);
792 dns_view_t *view;
793 dns_tsigkey_t *key = NULL;
794 dns_name_t *tsig = NULL;
795 isc_netaddr_t netsrc;
796 isc_netaddr_t netdst;
797
798 if (interfacemgr == NULL)
799 return (true);
800
801 if (!ns_interfacemgr_listeningon(interfacemgr, dstaddr))
802 return (false);
803
804 isc_netaddr_fromsockaddr(&netsrc, srcaddr);
805 isc_netaddr_fromsockaddr(&netdst, dstaddr);
806
807 for (view = ISC_LIST_HEAD(named_g_server->viewlist);
808 view != NULL;
809 view = ISC_LIST_NEXT(view, link)) {
810
811 if (view->matchrecursiveonly)
812 continue;
813
814 if (rdclass != view->rdclass)
815 continue;
816
817 if (mykey != NULL) {
818 bool match;
819 isc_result_t result;
820
821 result = dns_view_gettsig(view, &mykey->name, &key);
822 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
823 continue;
824 match = dst_key_compare(mykey->key, key->key);
825 dns_tsigkey_detach(&key);
826 if (!match)
827 continue;
828 tsig = dns_tsigkey_identity(mykey);
829 }
830
831 if (dns_acl_allowed(&netsrc, tsig, view->matchclients, env) &&
832 dns_acl_allowed(&netdst, tsig, view->matchdestinations,
833 env))
834 {
835 break;
836 }
837 }
838 return (view == myview);
839}
840
841/*%
842 * For mirror zones, change "notify yes;" to "notify explicit;", informing the
843 * user only if "notify" was explicitly configured rather than inherited from
844 * default configuration.
845 */
846static dns_notifytype_t
847process_notifytype(dns_notifytype_t ntype, dns_zonetype_t ztype,
848 const char *zname, const cfg_obj_t **maps)
849{
850 const cfg_obj_t *obj = NULL;
851
852 /*
853 * Return the original setting if this is not a mirror zone or if the
854 * zone is configured with something else than "notify yes;".
855 */
856 if (ztype != dns_zone_mirror || ntype != dns_notifytype_yes) {
857 return (ntype);
858 }
859
860 /*
861 * Only log a message if "notify" was set in the configuration
862 * hierarchy supplied in 'maps'.
863 */
864 if (named_config_get(maps, "notify", &obj) == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
865 cfg_obj_log(obj, named_g_lctx, ISC_LOG_INFO,
866 "'notify explicit;' will be used for mirror zone "
867 "'%s'", zname);
868 }
869
870 return (dns_notifytype_explicit);
871}
872
873isc_result_t
874named_zone_configure(const cfg_obj_t *config, const cfg_obj_t *vconfig,
875 const cfg_obj_t *zconfig, cfg_aclconfctx_t *ac,
876 dns_zone_t *zone, dns_zone_t *raw)
877{
878 isc_result_t result;
879 const char *zname;
880 dns_rdataclass_t zclass;
881 dns_rdataclass_t vclass;
882 const cfg_obj_t *maps[5];
883 const cfg_obj_t *nodefault[4];
884 const cfg_obj_t *zoptions = NULL;
885 const cfg_obj_t *options = NULL;
886 const cfg_obj_t *obj;
887 const char *filename = NULL;
888 const char *dupcheck;
889 dns_notifytype_t notifytype = dns_notifytype_yes;
890 uint32_t count;
891 unsigned int dbargc;
892 char **dbargv;
893 static char default_dbtype[] = "rbt";
894 static char dlz_dbtype[] = "dlz";
895 char *cpval = default_dbtype;
896 isc_mem_t *mctx = dns_zone_getmctx(zone);
897 dns_dialuptype_t dialup = dns_dialuptype_no;
898 dns_zonetype_t ztype;
899 int i;
900 int32_t journal_size;
901 bool multi;
902 bool alt;
903 dns_view_t *view;
904 bool check = false, fail = false;
905 bool warn = false, ignore = false;
906 bool ixfrdiff;
907 dns_masterformat_t masterformat;
908 const dns_master_style_t *masterstyle = &dns_master_style_default;
909 isc_stats_t *zoneqrystats;
910 dns_stats_t *rcvquerystats;
911 dns_zonestat_level_t statlevel = dns_zonestat_none;
912 int seconds;
913 dns_zone_t *mayberaw = (raw != NULL) ? raw : zone;
914 isc_dscp_t dscp;
915
916 i = 0;
917 if (zconfig != NULL) {
918 zoptions = cfg_tuple_get(zconfig, "options");
919 nodefault[i] = maps[i] = zoptions;
920 i++;
921 }
922 if (vconfig != NULL) {
923 nodefault[i] = maps[i] = cfg_tuple_get(vconfig, "options");
924 i++;
925 }
926 if (config != NULL) {
927 (void)cfg_map_get(config, "options", &options);
928 if (options != NULL) {
929 nodefault[i] = maps[i] = options;
930 i++;
931 }
932 }
933 nodefault[i] = NULL;
934 maps[i++] = named_g_defaults;
935 maps[i] = NULL;
936
937 if (vconfig != NULL)
938 RETERR(named_config_getclass(cfg_tuple_get(vconfig, "class"),
939 dns_rdataclass_in, &vclass));
940 else
941 vclass = dns_rdataclass_in;
942
943 /*
944 * Configure values common to all zone types.
945 */
946
947 zname = cfg_obj_asstring(cfg_tuple_get(zconfig, "name"));
948
949 RETERR(named_config_getclass(cfg_tuple_get(zconfig, "class"),
950 vclass, &zclass));
951 dns_zone_setclass(zone, zclass);
952 if (raw != NULL)
953 dns_zone_setclass(raw, zclass);
954
955 ztype = zonetype_fromconfig(zoptions);
956 if (raw != NULL) {
957 dns_zone_settype(raw, ztype);
958 dns_zone_settype(zone, dns_zone_master);
959 } else
960 dns_zone_settype(zone, ztype);
961
962 obj = NULL;
963 result = cfg_map_get(zoptions, "database", &obj);
964 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
965 cpval = isc_mem_strdup(mctx, cfg_obj_asstring(obj));
966 if (cpval == NULL)
967 return(ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
968
969 obj = NULL;
970 result = cfg_map_get(zoptions, "dlz", &obj);
971 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
972 const char *dlzname = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
973 size_t len;
974
975 if (cpval != default_dbtype) {
976 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
977 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
978 "zone '%s': both 'database' and 'dlz' "
979 "specified", zname);
980 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
981 }
982
983 len = strlen(dlzname) + 5;
984 cpval = isc_mem_allocate(mctx, len);
985 if (cpval == NULL)
986 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
987 snprintf(cpval, len, "dlz %s", dlzname);
988 }
989
990 result = strtoargv(mctx, cpval, &dbargc, &dbargv);
991 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS && cpval != default_dbtype) {
992 isc_mem_free(mctx, cpval);
993 return (result);
994 }
995
996 /*
997 * ANSI C is strange here. There is no logical reason why (char **)
998 * cannot be promoted automatically to (const char * const *) by the
999 * compiler w/o generating a warning.
1000 */
1001 result = dns_zone_setdbtype(zone, dbargc, (const char * const *)dbargv);
1002 isc_mem_put(mctx, dbargv, dbargc * sizeof(*dbargv));
1003 if (cpval != default_dbtype && cpval != dlz_dbtype)
1004 isc_mem_free(mctx, cpval);
1005 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1006 return (result);
1007
1008 obj = NULL;
1009 result = cfg_map_get(zoptions, "file", &obj);
1010 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1011 filename = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1012
1013 /*
1014 * Unless we're using some alternative database, a master zone
1015 * will be needing a master file.
1016 */
1017 if (ztype == dns_zone_master && cpval == default_dbtype &&
1018 filename == NULL) {
1019 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
1020 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1021 "zone '%s': 'file' not specified",
1022 zname);
1023 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
1024 }
1025
1026 if (ztype == dns_zone_slave || ztype == dns_zone_mirror)
1027 masterformat = dns_masterformat_raw;
1028 else
1029 masterformat = dns_masterformat_text;
1030 obj = NULL;
1031 result = named_config_get(maps, "masterfile-format", &obj);
1032 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1033 const char *masterformatstr = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1034
1035 if (strcasecmp(masterformatstr, "text") == 0) {
1036 masterformat = dns_masterformat_text;
1037 } else if (strcasecmp(masterformatstr, "raw") == 0) {
1038 masterformat = dns_masterformat_raw;
1039 } else if (strcasecmp(masterformatstr, "map") == 0) {
1040 masterformat = dns_masterformat_map;
1041 } else {
1042 INSIST(0);
1043 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1044 }
1045 }
1046
1047 obj = NULL;
1048 result = named_config_get(maps, "masterfile-style", &obj);
1049 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1050 const char *masterstylestr = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1051
1052 if (masterformat != dns_masterformat_text) {
1053 cfg_obj_log(obj, named_g_lctx, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1054 "zone '%s': 'masterfile-style' "
1055 "can only be used with "
1056 "'masterfile-format text'", zname);
1057 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
1058 }
1059
1060 if (strcasecmp(masterstylestr, "full") == 0) {
1061 masterstyle = &dns_master_style_full;
1062 } else if (strcasecmp(masterstylestr, "relative") == 0) {
1063 masterstyle = &dns_master_style_default;
1064 } else {
1065 INSIST(0);
1066 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1067 }
1068 }
1069
1070 obj = NULL;
1071 result = named_config_get(maps, "max-zone-ttl", &obj);
1072 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && masterformat == dns_masterformat_map) {
1073 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL,
1074 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1075 "zone '%s': 'max-zone-ttl' is not compatible "
1076 "with 'masterfile-format map'", zname);
1077 return (ISC_R_FAILURE);
1078 } else if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1079 dns_ttl_t maxttl = 0; /* unlimited */
1080
1081 if (cfg_obj_isuint32(obj))
1082 maxttl = cfg_obj_asuint32(obj);
1083 dns_zone_setmaxttl(zone, maxttl);
1084 if (raw != NULL)
1085 dns_zone_setmaxttl(raw, maxttl);
1086 }
1087
1088 obj = NULL;
1089 result = named_config_get(maps, "max-records", &obj);
1090 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1091 dns_zone_setmaxrecords(mayberaw, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj));
1092 if (zone != mayberaw)
1093 dns_zone_setmaxrecords(zone, 0);
1094
1095 if (raw != NULL && filename != NULL) {
1096#define SIGNED ".signed"
1097 size_t signedlen = strlen(filename) + sizeof(SIGNED);
1098 char *signedname;
1099
1100 RETERR(dns_zone_setfile(raw, filename,
1101 masterformat, masterstyle));
1102 signedname = isc_mem_get(mctx, signedlen);
1103 if (signedname == NULL)
1104 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
1105
1106 (void)snprintf(signedname, signedlen, "%s" SIGNED, filename);
1107 result = dns_zone_setfile(zone, signedname,
1108 dns_masterformat_raw, NULL);
1109 isc_mem_put(mctx, signedname, signedlen);
1110 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1111 return (result);
1112 } else
1113 RETERR(dns_zone_setfile(zone, filename,
1114 masterformat, masterstyle));
1115
1116 obj = NULL;
1117 result = cfg_map_get(zoptions, "journal", &obj);
1118 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1119 RETERR(dns_zone_setjournal(mayberaw, cfg_obj_asstring(obj)));
1120
1121 /*
1122 * Notify messages are processed by the raw zone if it exists.
1123 */
1124 if (ztype == dns_zone_slave || ztype == dns_zone_mirror)
1125 RETERR(configure_zone_acl(zconfig, vconfig, config,
1126 allow_notify, ac, mayberaw,
1127 dns_zone_setnotifyacl,
1128 dns_zone_clearnotifyacl));
1129
1130 /*
1131 * XXXAG This probably does not make sense for stubs.
1132 */
1133 RETERR(configure_zone_acl(zconfig, vconfig, config,
1134 allow_query, ac, zone,
1135 dns_zone_setqueryacl,
1136 dns_zone_clearqueryacl));
1137
1138 RETERR(configure_zone_acl(zconfig, vconfig, config,
1139 allow_query_on, ac, zone,
1140 dns_zone_setqueryonacl,
1141 dns_zone_clearqueryonacl));
1142
1143 obj = NULL;
1144 result = named_config_get(maps, "dialup", &obj);
1145 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1146 if (cfg_obj_isboolean(obj)) {
1147 if (cfg_obj_asboolean(obj))
1148 dialup = dns_dialuptype_yes;
1149 else
1150 dialup = dns_dialuptype_no;
1151 } else {
1152 const char *dialupstr = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1153 if (strcasecmp(dialupstr, "notify") == 0) {
1154 dialup = dns_dialuptype_notify;
1155 } else if (strcasecmp(dialupstr, "notify-passive") == 0) {
1156 dialup = dns_dialuptype_notifypassive;
1157 } else if (strcasecmp(dialupstr, "refresh") == 0) {
1158 dialup = dns_dialuptype_refresh;
1159 } else if (strcasecmp(dialupstr, "passive") == 0) {
1160 dialup = dns_dialuptype_passive;
1161 } else {
1162 INSIST(0);
1163 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1164 }
1165 }
1166 if (raw != NULL)
1167 dns_zone_setdialup(raw, dialup);
1168 dns_zone_setdialup(zone, dialup);
1169
1170 obj = NULL;
1171 result = named_config_get(maps, "zone-statistics", &obj);
1172 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1173 if (cfg_obj_isboolean(obj)) {
1174 if (cfg_obj_asboolean(obj))
1175 statlevel = dns_zonestat_full;
1176 else
1177 statlevel = dns_zonestat_none;
1178 } else {
1179 const char *levelstr = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1180 if (strcasecmp(levelstr, "full") == 0) {
1181 statlevel = dns_zonestat_full;
1182 } else if (strcasecmp(levelstr, "terse") == 0) {
1183 statlevel = dns_zonestat_terse;
1184 } else if (strcasecmp(levelstr, "none") == 0) {
1185 statlevel = dns_zonestat_none;
1186 } else {
1187 INSIST(0);
1188 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1189 }
1190 }
1191 dns_zone_setstatlevel(zone, statlevel);
1192
1193 zoneqrystats = NULL;
1194 rcvquerystats = NULL;
1195 if (statlevel == dns_zonestat_full) {
1196 RETERR(isc_stats_create(mctx, &zoneqrystats,
1197 ns_statscounter_max));
1198 RETERR(dns_rdatatypestats_create(mctx,
1199 &rcvquerystats));
1200 }
1201 dns_zone_setrequeststats(zone, zoneqrystats);
1202 dns_zone_setrcvquerystats(zone, rcvquerystats);
1203
1204 if (zoneqrystats != NULL)
1205 isc_stats_detach(&zoneqrystats);
1206
1207 if(rcvquerystats != NULL)
1208 dns_stats_detach(&rcvquerystats);
1209
1210 /*
1211 * Configure master functionality. This applies
1212 * to primary masters (type "master") and slaves
1213 * acting as masters (type "slave"), but not to stubs.
1214 */
1215 if (ztype != dns_zone_stub && ztype != dns_zone_staticstub &&
1216 ztype != dns_zone_redirect) {
1217 obj = NULL;
1218 result = named_config_get(maps, "notify", &obj);
1219 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1220 if (cfg_obj_isboolean(obj)) {
1221 if (cfg_obj_asboolean(obj))
1222 notifytype = dns_notifytype_yes;
1223 else
1224 notifytype = dns_notifytype_no;
1225 } else {
1226 const char *notifystr = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1227 if (strcasecmp(notifystr, "explicit") == 0) {
1228 notifytype = dns_notifytype_explicit;
1229 } else if (strcasecmp(notifystr, "master-only") == 0) {
1230 notifytype = dns_notifytype_masteronly;
1231 } else {
1232 INSIST(0);
1233 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1234 }
1235 }
1236 notifytype = process_notifytype(notifytype, ztype, zname,
1237 nodefault);
1238 if (raw != NULL)
1239 dns_zone_setnotifytype(raw, dns_notifytype_no);
1240 dns_zone_setnotifytype(zone, notifytype);
1241
1242 obj = NULL;
1243 result = named_config_get(maps, "also-notify", &obj);
1244 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS &&
1245 (notifytype == dns_notifytype_yes ||
1246 notifytype == dns_notifytype_explicit ||
1247 (notifytype == dns_notifytype_masteronly &&
1248 ztype == dns_zone_master)))
1249 {
1250 dns_ipkeylist_t ipkl;
1251 dns_ipkeylist_init(&ipkl);
1252
1253 RETERR(named_config_getipandkeylist(config, obj, mctx,
1254 &ipkl));
1255 result = dns_zone_setalsonotifydscpkeys(zone,
1256 ipkl.addrs,
1257 ipkl.dscps,
1258 ipkl.keys,
1259 ipkl.count);
1260 dns_ipkeylist_clear(mctx, &ipkl);
1261 RETERR(result);
1262 } else
1263 RETERR(dns_zone_setalsonotify(zone, NULL, 0));
1264
1265 obj = NULL;
1266 result = named_config_get(maps, "notify-source", &obj);
1267 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1268 RETERR(dns_zone_setnotifysrc4(zone, cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj)));
1269 dscp = cfg_obj_getdscp(obj);
1270 if (dscp == -1)
1271 dscp = named_g_dscp;
1272 RETERR(dns_zone_setnotifysrc4dscp(zone, dscp));
1273 named_add_reserved_dispatch(named_g_server,
1274 cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj));
1275
1276 obj = NULL;
1277 result = named_config_get(maps, "notify-source-v6", &obj);
1278 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1279 RETERR(dns_zone_setnotifysrc6(zone, cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj)));
1280 dscp = cfg_obj_getdscp(obj);
1281 if (dscp == -1)
1282 dscp = named_g_dscp;
1283 RETERR(dns_zone_setnotifysrc6dscp(zone, dscp));
1284 named_add_reserved_dispatch(named_g_server,
1285 cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj));
1286
1287 obj = NULL;
1288 result = named_config_get(maps, "notify-to-soa", &obj);
1289 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1290 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_NOTIFYTOSOA,
1291 cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1292
1293 dns_zone_setisself(zone, isself, named_g_server->interfacemgr);
1294
1295 RETERR(configure_zone_acl(zconfig, vconfig, config,
1296 allow_transfer, ac, zone,
1297 dns_zone_setxfracl,
1298 dns_zone_clearxfracl));
1299
1300 obj = NULL;
1301 result = named_config_get(maps, "max-transfer-time-out", &obj);
1302 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1303 dns_zone_setmaxxfrout(zone, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj) * 60);
1304
1305 obj = NULL;
1306 result = named_config_get(maps, "max-transfer-idle-out", &obj);
1307 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1308 dns_zone_setidleout(zone, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj) * 60);
1309
1310 obj = NULL;
1311 result = named_config_get(maps, "max-journal-size", &obj);
1312 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1313 if (raw != NULL)
1314 dns_zone_setjournalsize(raw, -1);
1315 dns_zone_setjournalsize(zone, -1);
1316 if (cfg_obj_isstring(obj)) {
1317 const char *str = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1318 if (strcasecmp(str, "unlimited") == 0) {
1319 journal_size = DNS_JOURNAL_SIZE_MAX;
1320 } else {
1321 INSIST(strcasecmp(str, "default") == 0);
1322 journal_size = -1;
1323 }
1324 } else {
1325 isc_resourcevalue_t value;
1326 value = cfg_obj_asuint64(obj);
1327 if (value > DNS_JOURNAL_SIZE_MAX) {
1328 cfg_obj_log(obj, named_g_lctx,
1329 ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1330 "'max-journal-size "
1331 "%" PRId64 "' "
1332 "is too large",
1333 value);
1334 RETERR(ISC_R_RANGE);
1335 }
1336 journal_size = (uint32_t)value;
1337 }
1338 if (raw != NULL)
1339 dns_zone_setjournalsize(raw, journal_size);
1340 dns_zone_setjournalsize(zone, journal_size);
1341
1342 obj = NULL;
1343 result = named_config_get(maps, "ixfr-from-differences", &obj);
1344 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1345 if (cfg_obj_isboolean(obj)) {
1346 ixfrdiff = cfg_obj_asboolean(obj);
1347 } else if ((strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj),
1348 "primary") == 0 ||
1349 strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj),
1350 "master") == 0) &&
1351 ztype == dns_zone_master)
1352 {
1353 ixfrdiff = true;
1354 } else if ((strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj),
1355 "secondary") == 0 ||
1356 strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj),
1357 "slave") == 0) &&
1358 ztype == dns_zone_slave)
1359 {
1360 ixfrdiff = true;
1361 } else {
1362 ixfrdiff = false;
1363 }
1364 if (raw != NULL) {
1365 dns_zone_setoption(raw, DNS_ZONEOPT_IXFRFROMDIFFS,
1366 true);
1367 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_IXFRFROMDIFFS,
1368 false);
1369 } else
1370 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_IXFRFROMDIFFS,
1371 ixfrdiff);
1372
1373 obj = NULL;
1374 result = named_config_get(maps, "request-expire", &obj);
1375 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1376 dns_zone_setrequestexpire(zone, cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1377
1378 obj = NULL;
1379 result = named_config_get(maps, "request-ixfr", &obj);
1380 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1381 dns_zone_setrequestixfr(zone, cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1382
1383 checknames(ztype, maps, &obj);
1384 INSIST(obj != NULL);
1385 if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "warn") == 0) {
1386 fail = false;
1387 check = true;
1388 } else if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "fail") == 0) {
1389 fail = check = true;
1390 } else if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "ignore") == 0) {
1391 fail = check = false;
1392 } else {
1393 INSIST(0);
1394 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1395 }
1396 if (raw != NULL) {
1397 dns_zone_setoption(raw, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKNAMES,
1398 check);
1399 dns_zone_setoption(raw, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKNAMESFAIL,
1400 fail);
1401 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKNAMES,
1402 false);
1403 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKNAMESFAIL,
1404 false);
1405 } else {
1406 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKNAMES,
1407 check);
1408 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKNAMESFAIL,
1409 fail);
1410 }
1411
1412 obj = NULL;
1413 result = named_config_get(maps, "notify-delay", &obj);
1414 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1415 dns_zone_setnotifydelay(zone, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj));
1416
1417 obj = NULL;
1418 result = named_config_get(maps, "check-sibling", &obj);
1419 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1420 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKSIBLING,
1421 cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1422
1423 obj = NULL;
1424 result = named_config_get(maps, "check-spf", &obj);
1425 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1426 if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "warn") == 0) {
1427 check = true;
1428 } else if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "ignore") == 0) {
1429 check = false;
1430 } else {
1431 INSIST(0);
1432 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1433 }
1434 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKSPF, check);
1435
1436 obj = NULL;
1437 result = named_config_get(maps, "zero-no-soa-ttl", &obj);
1438 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1439 dns_zone_setzeronosoattl(zone, cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1440
1441 obj = NULL;
1442 result = named_config_get(maps, "nsec3-test-zone", &obj);
1443 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1444 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_NSEC3TESTZONE,
1445 cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1446 } else if (ztype == dns_zone_redirect) {
1447 dns_zone_setnotifytype(zone, dns_notifytype_no);
1448
1449 obj = NULL;
1450 result = named_config_get(maps, "max-journal-size", &obj);
1451 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1452 dns_zone_setjournalsize(zone, -1);
1453 if (cfg_obj_isstring(obj)) {
1454 const char *str = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1455 if (strcasecmp(str, "unlimited") == 0) {
1456 journal_size = DNS_JOURNAL_SIZE_MAX;
1457 } else {
1458 INSIST(strcasecmp(str, "default") == 0);
1459 journal_size = -1;
1460 }
1461 } else {
1462 isc_resourcevalue_t value;
1463 value = cfg_obj_asuint64(obj);
1464 if (value > DNS_JOURNAL_SIZE_MAX) {
1465 cfg_obj_log(obj, named_g_lctx,
1466 ISC_LOG_ERROR,
1467 "'max-journal-size "
1468 "%" PRId64 "' "
1469 "is too large",
1470 value);
1471 RETERR(ISC_R_RANGE);
1472 }
1473 journal_size = (uint32_t)value;
1474 }
1475 dns_zone_setjournalsize(zone, journal_size);
1476 }
1477
1478 /*
1479 * Configure update-related options. These apply to
1480 * primary masters only.
1481 */
1482 if (ztype == dns_zone_master) {
1483 dns_acl_t *updateacl;
1484
1485 RETERR(configure_zone_acl(zconfig, vconfig, config,
1486 allow_update, ac, mayberaw,
1487 dns_zone_setupdateacl,
1488 dns_zone_clearupdateacl));
1489
1490 updateacl = dns_zone_getupdateacl(mayberaw);
1491 if (updateacl != NULL && dns_acl_isinsecure(updateacl))
1492 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, DNS_LOGCATEGORY_SECURITY,
1493 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, ISC_LOG_WARNING,
1494 "zone '%s' allows unsigned updates "
1495 "from remote hosts, which is insecure",
1496 zname);
1497
1498 RETERR(configure_zone_ssutable(zoptions, mayberaw, zname));
1499 }
1500
1501 if (ztype == dns_zone_master || raw != NULL) {
1502 const cfg_obj_t *validity, *resign;
1503 bool allow = false, maint = false;
1504 bool sigvalinsecs;
1505
1506 obj = NULL;
1507 result = named_config_get(maps, "dnskey-sig-validity", &obj);
1508 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1509 seconds = cfg_obj_asuint32(obj) * 86400;
1510 dns_zone_setkeyvalidityinterval(zone, seconds);
1511
1512 obj = NULL;
1513 result = named_config_get(maps, "sig-validity-interval", &obj);
1514 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1515
1516 sigvalinsecs = ns_server_getoption(named_g_server->sctx,
1517 NS_SERVER_SIGVALINSECS);
1518 validity = cfg_tuple_get(obj, "validity");
1519 seconds = cfg_obj_asuint32(validity);
1520 if (!sigvalinsecs) {
1521 seconds *= 86400;
1522 }
1523 dns_zone_setsigvalidityinterval(zone, seconds);
1524
1525 resign = cfg_tuple_get(obj, "re-sign");
1526 if (cfg_obj_isvoid(resign)) {
1527 seconds /= 4;
1528 } else if (!sigvalinsecs) {
1529 if (seconds > 7 * 86400) {
1530 seconds = cfg_obj_asuint32(resign) * 86400;
1531 } else {
1532 seconds = cfg_obj_asuint32(resign) * 3600;
1533 }
1534 } else {
1535 seconds = cfg_obj_asuint32(resign);
1536 }
1537 dns_zone_setsigresigninginterval(zone, seconds);
1538
1539 obj = NULL;
1540 result = named_config_get(maps, "key-directory", &obj);
1541 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1542 filename = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1543 RETERR(dns_zone_setkeydirectory(zone, filename));
1544 }
1545
1546 obj = NULL;
1547 result = named_config_get(maps, "sig-signing-signatures", &obj);
1548 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1549 dns_zone_setsignatures(zone, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj));
1550
1551 obj = NULL;
1552 result = named_config_get(maps, "sig-signing-nodes", &obj);
1553 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1554 dns_zone_setnodes(zone, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj));
1555
1556 obj = NULL;
1557 result = named_config_get(maps, "sig-signing-type", &obj);
1558 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1559 dns_zone_setprivatetype(zone, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj));
1560
1561 obj = NULL;
1562 result = named_config_get(maps, "update-check-ksk", &obj);
1563 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1564 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_UPDATECHECKKSK,
1565 cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1566
1567 obj = NULL;
1568 result = named_config_get(maps, "dnssec-dnskey-kskonly", &obj);
1569 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1570 dns_zone_setoption(zone, DNS_ZONEOPT_DNSKEYKSKONLY,
1571 cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1572
1573 obj = NULL;
1574 result = named_config_get(maps, "dnssec-loadkeys-interval",
1575 &obj);
1576 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1577 RETERR(dns_zone_setrefreshkeyinterval(zone,
1578 cfg_obj_asuint32(obj)));
1579
1580 obj = NULL;
1581 result = cfg_map_get(zoptions, "auto-dnssec", &obj);
1582 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1583 const char *arg = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1584 if (strcasecmp(arg, "allow") == 0) {
1585 allow = true;
1586 } else if (strcasecmp(arg, "maintain") == 0) {
1587 allow = maint = true;
1588 } else if (strcasecmp(arg, "off") == 0) {
1589 ;
1590 } else {
1591 INSIST(0);
1592 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1593 }
1594 dns_zone_setkeyopt(zone, DNS_ZONEKEY_ALLOW, allow);
1595 dns_zone_setkeyopt(zone, DNS_ZONEKEY_MAINTAIN, maint);
1596 }
1597 }
1598
1599 if (ztype == dns_zone_slave || ztype == dns_zone_mirror) {
1600 RETERR(configure_zone_acl(zconfig, vconfig, config,
1601 allow_update_forwarding, ac,
1602 mayberaw, dns_zone_setforwardacl,
1603 dns_zone_clearforwardacl));
1604 }
1605
1606 /*%
1607 * Primary master functionality.
1608 */
1609 if (ztype == dns_zone_master) {
1610 obj = NULL;
1611 result = named_config_get(maps, "check-wildcard", &obj);
1612 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1613 check = cfg_obj_asboolean(obj);
1614 else
1615 check = false;
1616 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKWILDCARD, check);
1617
1618 /*
1619 * With map files, the default is ignore duplicate
1620 * records. With other master formats, the default is
1621 * taken from the global configuration.
1622 */
1623 obj = NULL;
1624 if (masterformat != dns_masterformat_map) {
1625 result = named_config_get(maps, "check-dup-records",
1626 &obj);
1627 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1628 dupcheck = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1629 } else {
1630 result = named_config_get(nodefault,
1631 "check-dup-records",
1632 &obj);
1633 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1634 dupcheck = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1635 else
1636 dupcheck = "ignore";
1637
1638 }
1639 if (strcasecmp(dupcheck, "warn") == 0) {
1640 fail = false;
1641 check = true;
1642 } else if (strcasecmp(dupcheck, "fail") == 0) {
1643 fail = check = true;
1644 } else if (strcasecmp(dupcheck, "ignore") == 0) {
1645 fail = check = false;
1646 } else {
1647 INSIST(0);
1648 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1649 }
1650 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKDUPRR, check);
1651 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKDUPRRFAIL, fail);
1652
1653 obj = NULL;
1654 result = named_config_get(maps, "check-mx", &obj);
1655 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1656 if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "warn") == 0) {
1657 fail = false;
1658 check = true;
1659 } else if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "fail") == 0) {
1660 fail = check = true;
1661 } else if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "ignore") == 0) {
1662 fail = check = false;
1663 } else {
1664 INSIST(0);
1665 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1666 }
1667 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKMX, check);
1668 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKMXFAIL, fail);
1669
1670 /*
1671 * With map files, the default is *not* to check
1672 * integrity. With other master formats, the default is
1673 * taken from the global configuration.
1674 */
1675 obj = NULL;
1676 if (masterformat != dns_masterformat_map) {
1677 result = named_config_get(maps, "check-integrity",
1678 &obj);
1679 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1680 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKINTEGRITY,
1681 cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1682 } else {
1683 check = false;
1684 result = named_config_get(nodefault, "check-integrity",
1685 &obj);
1686 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1687 check = cfg_obj_asboolean(obj);
1688 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_CHECKINTEGRITY,
1689 check);
1690 }
1691
1692 obj = NULL;
1693 result = named_config_get(maps, "check-mx-cname", &obj);
1694 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1695 if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "warn") == 0) {
1696 warn = true;
1697 ignore = false;
1698 } else if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "fail") == 0) {
1699 warn = ignore = false;
1700 } else if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "ignore") == 0) {
1701 warn = ignore = true;
1702 } else {
1703 INSIST(0);
1704 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1705 }
1706 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_WARNMXCNAME, warn);
1707 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_IGNOREMXCNAME, ignore);
1708
1709 obj = NULL;
1710 result = named_config_get(maps, "check-srv-cname", &obj);
1711 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1712 if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "warn") == 0) {
1713 warn = true;
1714 ignore = false;
1715 } else if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "fail") == 0) {
1716 warn = ignore = false;
1717 } else if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "ignore") == 0) {
1718 warn = ignore = true;
1719 } else {
1720 INSIST(0);
1721 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1722 }
1723 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_WARNSRVCNAME, warn);
1724 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_IGNORESRVCNAME,
1725 ignore);
1726
1727 obj = NULL;
1728 result = named_config_get(maps, "dnssec-secure-to-insecure",
1729 &obj);
1730 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1731 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_SECURETOINSECURE,
1732 cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1733
1734 obj = NULL;
1735 result = cfg_map_get(zoptions, "dnssec-update-mode", &obj);
1736 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
1737 const char *arg = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
1738 if (strcasecmp(arg, "no-resign") == 0) {
1739 dns_zone_setkeyopt(zone, DNS_ZONEKEY_NORESIGN,
1740 true);
1741 } else if (strcasecmp(arg, "maintain") == 0) {
1742 ;
1743 } else {
1744 INSIST(0);
1745 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
1746 }
1747 }
1748
1749 obj = NULL;
1750 result = named_config_get(maps, "serial-update-method", &obj);
1751 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1752 if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "unixtime") == 0)
1753 dns_zone_setserialupdatemethod(zone,
1754 dns_updatemethod_unixtime);
1755 else if (strcasecmp(cfg_obj_asstring(obj), "date") == 0)
1756 dns_zone_setserialupdatemethod(zone,
1757 dns_updatemethod_date);
1758 else
1759 dns_zone_setserialupdatemethod(zone,
1760 dns_updatemethod_increment);
1761 }
1762
1763 /*
1764 * Configure slave functionality.
1765 */
1766 switch (ztype) {
1767 case dns_zone_mirror:
1768 /*
1769 * Disable outgoing zone transfers for mirror zones unless they
1770 * are explicitly enabled by zone configuration.
1771 */
1772 obj = NULL;
1773 (void)cfg_map_get(zoptions, "allow-transfer", &obj);
1774 if (obj == NULL) {
1775 dns_acl_t *none;
1776 RETERR(dns_acl_none(mctx, &none));
1777 dns_zone_setxfracl(zone, none);
1778 dns_acl_detach(&none);
1779 }
1780 /* FALLTHROUGH */
1781 case dns_zone_slave:
1782 case dns_zone_stub:
1783 case dns_zone_redirect:
1784 count = 0;
1785 obj = NULL;
1786 (void)cfg_map_get(zoptions, "masters", &obj);
1787 /*
1788 * Use the built-in master server list if one was not
1789 * explicitly specified and this is a root zone mirror.
1790 */
1791 if (obj == NULL && ztype == dns_zone_mirror &&
1792 dns_name_equal(dns_zone_getorigin(zone), dns_rootname))
1793 {
1794 result = named_config_getmastersdef(named_g_config,
1795 DEFAULT_IANA_ROOT_ZONE_MASTERS,
1796 &obj);
1797 RETERR(result);
1798 }
1799 if (obj != NULL) {
1800 dns_ipkeylist_t ipkl;
1801 dns_ipkeylist_init(&ipkl);
1802
1803 RETERR(named_config_getipandkeylist(config, obj, mctx,
1804 &ipkl));
1805 result = dns_zone_setmasterswithkeys(mayberaw,
1806 ipkl.addrs,
1807 ipkl.keys,
1808 ipkl.count);
1809 count = ipkl.count;
1810 dns_ipkeylist_clear(mctx, &ipkl);
1811 RETERR(result);
1812 } else
1813 result = dns_zone_setmasters(mayberaw, NULL, 0);
1814 RETERR(result);
1815
1816 multi = false;
1817 if (count > 1) {
1818 obj = NULL;
1819 result = named_config_get(maps, "multi-master", &obj);
1820 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1821 multi = cfg_obj_asboolean(obj);
1822 }
1823 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_MULTIMASTER, multi);
1824
1825 obj = NULL;
1826 result = named_config_get(maps, "max-transfer-time-in", &obj);
1827 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1828 dns_zone_setmaxxfrin(mayberaw, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj) * 60);
1829
1830 obj = NULL;
1831 result = named_config_get(maps, "max-transfer-idle-in", &obj);
1832 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1833 dns_zone_setidlein(mayberaw, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj) * 60);
1834
1835 obj = NULL;
1836 result = named_config_get(maps, "max-refresh-time", &obj);
1837 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1838 dns_zone_setmaxrefreshtime(mayberaw, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj));
1839
1840 obj = NULL;
1841 result = named_config_get(maps, "min-refresh-time", &obj);
1842 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1843 dns_zone_setminrefreshtime(mayberaw, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj));
1844
1845 obj = NULL;
1846 result = named_config_get(maps, "max-retry-time", &obj);
1847 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1848 dns_zone_setmaxretrytime(mayberaw, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj));
1849
1850 obj = NULL;
1851 result = named_config_get(maps, "min-retry-time", &obj);
1852 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1853 dns_zone_setminretrytime(mayberaw, cfg_obj_asuint32(obj));
1854
1855 obj = NULL;
1856 result = named_config_get(maps, "transfer-source", &obj);
1857 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1858 RETERR(dns_zone_setxfrsource4(mayberaw,
1859 cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj)));
1860 dscp = cfg_obj_getdscp(obj);
1861 if (dscp == -1)
1862 dscp = named_g_dscp;
1863 RETERR(dns_zone_setxfrsource4dscp(mayberaw, dscp));
1864 named_add_reserved_dispatch(named_g_server,
1865 cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj));
1866
1867 obj = NULL;
1868 result = named_config_get(maps, "transfer-source-v6", &obj);
1869 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1870 RETERR(dns_zone_setxfrsource6(mayberaw,
1871 cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj)));
1872 dscp = cfg_obj_getdscp(obj);
1873 if (dscp == -1)
1874 dscp = named_g_dscp;
1875 RETERR(dns_zone_setxfrsource6dscp(mayberaw, dscp));
1876 named_add_reserved_dispatch(named_g_server,
1877 cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj));
1878
1879 obj = NULL;
1880 result = named_config_get(maps, "alt-transfer-source", &obj);
1881 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1882 RETERR(dns_zone_setaltxfrsource4(mayberaw,
1883 cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj)));
1884 dscp = cfg_obj_getdscp(obj);
1885 if (dscp == -1)
1886 dscp = named_g_dscp;
1887 RETERR(dns_zone_setaltxfrsource4dscp(mayberaw, dscp));
1888
1889 obj = NULL;
1890 result = named_config_get(maps, "alt-transfer-source-v6", &obj);
1891 INSIST(result == ISC_R_SUCCESS && obj != NULL);
1892 RETERR(dns_zone_setaltxfrsource6(mayberaw,
1893 cfg_obj_assockaddr(obj)));
1894 dscp = cfg_obj_getdscp(obj);
1895 if (dscp == -1)
1896 dscp = named_g_dscp;
1897 RETERR(dns_zone_setaltxfrsource6dscp(mayberaw, dscp));
1898
1899 obj = NULL;
1900 (void)named_config_get(maps, "use-alt-transfer-source", &obj);
1901 if (obj == NULL) {
1902 /*
1903 * Default off when views are in use otherwise
1904 * on for BIND 8 compatibility.
1905 */
1906 view = dns_zone_getview(zone);
1907 if (view != NULL && strcmp(view->name, "_default") == 0)
1908 alt = true;
1909 else
1910 alt = false;
1911 } else
1912 alt = cfg_obj_asboolean(obj);
1913 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_USEALTXFRSRC, alt);
1914
1915 obj = NULL;
1916 (void)named_config_get(maps, "try-tcp-refresh", &obj);
1917 dns_zone_setoption(mayberaw, DNS_ZONEOPT_TRYTCPREFRESH,
1918 cfg_obj_asboolean(obj));
1919 break;
1920
1921 case dns_zone_staticstub:
1922 RETERR(configure_staticstub(zoptions, zone, zname,
1923 default_dbtype));
1924 break;
1925
1926 default:
1927 break;
1928 }
1929
1930 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
1931}
1932
1933/*
1934 * Set up a DLZ zone as writeable
1935 */
1936isc_result_t
1937named_zone_configure_writeable_dlz(dns_dlzdb_t *dlzdatabase,
1938 dns_zone_t *zone,
1939 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass,
1940 dns_name_t *name)
1941{
1942 dns_db_t *db = NULL;
1943 isc_time_t now;
1944 isc_result_t result;
1945
1946 TIME_NOW(&now);
1947
1948 dns_zone_settype(zone, dns_zone_dlz);
1949 result = dns_sdlz_setdb(dlzdatabase, rdclass, name, &db);
1950 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
1951 return (result);
1952 result = dns_zone_dlzpostload(zone, db);
1953 dns_db_detach(&db);
1954 return (result);
1955}
1956
1957bool
1958named_zone_reusable(dns_zone_t *zone, const cfg_obj_t *zconfig) {
1959 const cfg_obj_t *zoptions = NULL;
1960 const cfg_obj_t *obj = NULL;
1961 const char *cfilename;
1962 const char *zfilename;
1963 dns_zone_t *raw = NULL;
1964 bool has_raw;
1965 dns_zonetype_t ztype;
1966
1967 zoptions = cfg_tuple_get(zconfig, "options");
1968
1969 /*
1970 * We always reconfigure a static-stub zone for simplicity, assuming
1971 * the amount of data to be loaded is small.
1972 */
1973 if (zonetype_fromconfig(zoptions) == dns_zone_staticstub) {
1974 dns_zone_log(zone, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(1),
1975 "not reusable: staticstub");
1976 return (false);
1977 }
1978
1979 /* If there's a raw zone, use that for filename and type comparison */
1980 dns_zone_getraw(zone, &raw);
1981 if (raw != NULL) {
1982 zfilename = dns_zone_getfile(raw);
1983 ztype = dns_zone_gettype(raw);
1984 dns_zone_detach(&raw);
1985 has_raw = true;
1986 } else {
1987 zfilename = dns_zone_getfile(zone);
1988 ztype = dns_zone_gettype(zone);
1989 has_raw = false;
1990 }
1991
1992 obj = NULL;
1993 (void)cfg_map_get(zoptions, "inline-signing", &obj);
1994 if ((obj == NULL || !cfg_obj_asboolean(obj)) && has_raw) {
1995 dns_zone_log(zone, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(1),
1996 "not reusable: old zone was inline-signing");
1997 return (false);
1998 } else if ((obj != NULL && cfg_obj_asboolean(obj)) && !has_raw) {
1999 dns_zone_log(zone, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(1),
2000 "not reusable: old zone was not inline-signing");
2001 return (false);
2002 }
2003
2004 if (zonetype_fromconfig(zoptions) != ztype) {
2005 dns_zone_log(zone, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(1),
2006 "not reusable: type mismatch");
2007 return (false);
2008 }
2009
2010 obj = NULL;
2011 (void)cfg_map_get(zoptions, "file", &obj);
2012 if (obj != NULL)
2013 cfilename = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
2014 else
2015 cfilename = NULL;
2016 if (!((cfilename == NULL && zfilename == NULL) ||
2017 (cfilename != NULL && zfilename != NULL &&
2018 strcmp(cfilename, zfilename) == 0)))
2019 {
2020 dns_zone_log(zone, ISC_LOG_DEBUG(1),
2021 "not reusable: filename mismatch");
2022 return (false);
2023 }
2024
2025 return (true);
2026}
